mapper.select: SELECT * from parking WHERE (longitude BETWEEN ${swLng} AND ${neLng}) AND (latitude BETWEEN ${swLat} AND ${neLat})
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO parking(id, parkingName, longitude, latitude, phone, parkingFor, parkingStruct, rdnmadr, lnmadr, openDay, parkingCnt, weekOpen, weekClose, satOpen, satClose, holiOpen, holiClose, parkingFreeInfo, basicTime, basicCharge, addUnitTime, addUnitCharge, dayChargeTime, dayCharge, monthCharge) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.parkingName}, #{item.longitude}, #{item.latitude}, #{item.phone}, #{item.parkingFor}, #{item.parkingStruct}, #{item.rdnmadr}, #{item.lnmadr}, #{item.openDay}, #{item.parkingCnt}, #{item.weekOpen}, #{item.weekClose}, #{item.satOpen}, #{item.satClose}, #{item.holiOpen}, #{item.holiClose}, #{item.parkingFreeInfo}, #{item.basicTime}, #{item.basicCharge}, #{item.addUnitTime}, #{item.addUnitCharge}, #{item.dayChargeTime}, #{item.dayCharge}, #{item.monthCharge})
